zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，关注关键支撑位]
zh.content:
当前以太坊（ETH/USD）价格为2987.38，近期走势表现出震荡整理的特征。价格在2989.33的高点和2977.33的低点之间波动，显示出市场正在寻求明确的方向。短期内，多空双方的力量相对平衡，市场情绪保持谨慎。

在技术指标方面，MACD值为48.29116，尽管信号线数据缺失，但该值表明多头动力依然存在。SMA(20)位于2882.58，为价格提供了重要支撑，同时也暗示出短期内可能的回调修正。若价格跌破此均线，可能会引发更大的卖压。

支撑位方面，2980附近的区域是一个关键支撑，若能维持在此之上，将有助于价格回升。另一方面，主要阻力位在2990-3000区间，若价格突破此水平，将可能引发进一步的上涨趋势。在此关键区域内，交易者可密切关注市场动态。

交易建议上，建议短期交易者在2980附近寻找买入机会，若价格突破3000则可考虑加仓。反之，若价格持续跌破2980，需警惕风险并及时止损，以保护资金安全。整体来看，保持灵活的交易策略将是应对当前市场的最佳选择。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum (ETH) is currently trading at 2987.38, reflecting a slight 24-hour increase of 0.26%. This modest upward movement suggests a potential bullish trend, albeit within a narrow range defined by recent highs at 2989.33 and lows at 2977.33. The price action indicates a consolidation phase, with ETH testing the upper boundary of this range. A break above 2990 could signal a stronger bullish momentum, while a drop below 2977 may lead to increased selling pressure.

The absence of the Relative Strength Index (RSI) limits our ability to assess overbought or oversold conditions; however, the MACD reading of 48.29 indicates growing bullish momentum. This suggests that the buyers are gaining control, although caution is warranted until further confirmation arises. The 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) at 2882.58 provides a robust support level, suggesting that as long as ETH remains above this SMA, the bullish outlook remains intact.

In terms of support and resistance, traders should keep a close eye on the 2989.33 resistance level. A successful breakout here could open the door for a further rally, potentially targeting the psychological level of 3000. Conversely, if ETH fails to maintain its position above the 20-day SMA, a pullback toward the 2977.33 support level could be imminent, testing the strength of the current bullish sentiment.

Given the current market dynamics, short-term trading strategies could involve buying near support levels with tight stop-loss orders just below the 20-day SMA. Alternatively, traders might consider waiting for a confirmed breakout above 2990 to enter long positions, capitalizing on the momentum while managing risk effectively. This balanced approach will allow traders to navigate potential volatility while seeking opportunities for profit in the ETH/USD pair.
